original: evaṁ mayā śrutam ekasmiṁ samaye bhagavāṁ rājagṛhe viharati devadattaṁ lābha satkāra
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavām rājagṛhe viharati devadattam lābha satkāra

original: ślokam ārabhya bhikṣūn āmantrayati / candropamā bhikṣavo viharata / nityaṁ navakā
analyzed: ślokam ārabhya bhikṣūn āmantrayati candra upamāḥ bhikṣavaḥ viharata nityam navakā

original: iva hrīmantaḥ kuleṣv apragalbhā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkramata /
analyzed: iva hrīmantaḥ kuleṣu a pragalbhāḥ avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittam kulāni upasakramata

original: tad yathā cakṣuṣmāṁ puruṣo jarodapānaṁ vā nadīdurgaṁ vā parvata viṣamaṁ vā avakṛṣya
analyzed: tat yathā cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ jarā udapānam vā nadī durgam vā parvata viṣamam vā avakṛṣya

original: kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ vyavalokayed evam eva candropamā viharata nityaṁ navakā iva
analyzed: kāyam avakṛṣya cittam vyavalokayet evam eva candra upamāḥ viharata nityam navakāḥ iva

original: hrīmantaḥ kuleṣv apragalbhā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkramata /
analyzed: hrīmantaḥ kuleṣu a pragalbhāḥ avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittam kulāni upasakramata

original: kāśyapo hi bhikṣuś candropamo viharati nityaṁ navaka iva hrīmān kuleṣv apragalbho
analyzed: kāśyapaḥ hi bhikṣuḥ candra upamaḥ viharati nityam navakaḥ iva hrīmān kuleṣu a pragalbhaḥ

original: ’vakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkramati / tad yathā cakṣuṣmāṁ puruṣo
analyzed: vakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittam kulāni upasakramati tat yathā cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ

original: jarodapānaṁ vā nadī durgaṁ vā parvata viṣamaṁ vā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ vyavalokayed
analyzed: jarā udapānam vā nadī durgam vā parvata viṣamam vā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittam vyavalokayet

original: evam eva kāśyapo hi bhikṣuś candropamo viharati nityaṁ navaka iva hrīmāṁ kuleṣv apragalbhaḥ
analyzed: evam eva kāśyapaḥ hi bhikṣuḥ candra upamaḥ viharati nityam navakaḥ iva kuleṣu a pragalbhaḥ

original: avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkrāmati / kiṁ manyatha …
analyzed: avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittam kulāni upasakrāmati kim manyatha
